channeldata.description: Pylexique is a Python wrapper around Lexique383. It allows to extract lexical information from more than 140 000 French words in an Object Oriented way.  Features:    - Extract all lexical information from a French word such as       - orthographic and phonemics representations       - associated lemmas       - syllabation       - grammatical category       - gender and number       - frequencies in a corpus of books and in a body of film subtitles, etc…   - Get all related words to a given word.   - Easy to use Api.   - Easily integrate pylexique in your own projects as an imported library.   - Can be used as a command line tool.
channeldata.summary: Pylexique is a Python wrapper around Lexique383
